taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species libratus;

treatment.description: Described as differing from small plants of no. 184 in its mostly 3-foliolate primocane-leaves, these with elliptic-oblong merely acutish leaflets resembling those of the bracteal leaves.
